body.description: Thermal solution for your desktop computer! Add this Intel E97379-001 heat sink and fan to your computer and help keep your Intel CPU cool and increase its life and performance! The E97379-001 features an aluminum heat sink with a 3.5-inch (90 mm) fan and supports Intel Core i3 Socket 1156 processors with speeds of up to 3.06 GHz! It also supports Socket 1155 motherboards with "Sandy Bridge" processors! Get the ultimate cooling solution for your Intel CPU with this Intel E97379-001 heat sink and fan! Features/Specifications: Intel Socket 1155/1156 Aluminum Heat Sink and Fan General Features: Aluminum heat sink3.5-inch (90 mm) fan DC 12V, 0.17ASupports Intel Core i3 Socket 1156 processors up to 3.06 GHz Supports Intel Core i-series Socket 1155 "Sandy Bridge" processors 4-pin power connector (12-inch length, approximate)Regulatory Approvals: ULCE Package Includes: Intel Socket 1155/1156 Aluminum Heat Sink and Fan Additional Information: Notes:P/N: E97379-001Product Requirements: Supported motherboard (Socket 1155 or 1156)Supported CPUAvailable 4-pin power connector

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 1,502 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s consistent and reliable
reviews.reviewText: This fan runs like a champ. I had no issues installing it, though the clips are a little weak and can break easily if pressured too hard. However the noise level is good, and it keeps running and cooling down the motherboard well. I run a small mining operation and it keeps the temperatures around 65 C consistently with my other fans. I would recommend it if you are not looking to spend even more of your set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: same as the original fan, complete with thermal paste applied in it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Power Supply
reviews.reviewText: I am adding this review on a computer using the Intel E97379-001 power supply and it is SOOOO quiet I have to actually look at the lights on the computer to make sure it is running!! Easy to install and has enough power to run almost any computer - except a gaming unit with multiple fans and hard drives. I highly recommend this power supply and it had a great price also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fits LGA 1151 Socket replacement
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I purchased this cpu cooler to replace another cpu cooler that broke a few weeks months ago. It fits in properly in my lga1151 motherboard cpu socket quite well.The noise it produces isn't really noticeable per say, but if it's open benched like this then yes. It is still audible. However, if it's in a enclose pc case with ventilation, the noise won't be so high.This cpu cooler was a simple install to a point it has no instruction manual to install. Although to be honest it did made me question its compatibility with a Lga1151 motherboard. However it connected in quite nicely with no issues what so ever.It has some cheap barebone cpu thermal paste, but I would switch it for a better brand of cpu thermal paste.Value for the money? Eh, not that much really. This thing is really designed for office pc's and not anything really intensive for gaming. The cpu would skyrocket in heat quickly with this cpu cooler, I would get something better.However, if you want it for a open test bench or for a basic replacement for a office pc. This would work just fine for that.TL:DR - Basic knock off cpu cooler that works fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have it sitting on top of a I5 CPU, and it has given me no problems at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for my Intel i5 2500K
reviews.reviewText: My PC got over heated because the old fan broke, so it hangs at lock screen with temperature warning. I bought this fan, and it comes with pre-thermal paste on it. Easy to install, just snap it in and good to go. The temperature of my CPU go back to normal and boot to Windows like charm. have it for 2 months and notice temperature of CPU is stable and the fan does not make a lot of noise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This cooling fan was an identical replacement for the original fan in my Asus desktop. I had seen the temp getting high on my microprocessor, and the fan was noisy. Installation was easy, but you need to get it right the first time. Locking the fan in place consists of pushing pins through the middle of plastic fingers that expand to lock the fan to the circuit board. Once the fingers have expanded, it is hard to get them small enough for a second insertion into the circuit board hole. The new fan is very quiet, and the microprocessor temp is just as it should be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap, but works as intended.
reviews.reviewText: It's a cheap knock off of the original one. Fan's made out of cheap plastic, the fins are bendable, there's no copper inlay on the back, the power wire's shorter, and the sticker's also a cheap imitation. It looks nothing like the original one in the picture.But so far it does appear to do a good job at keeping the CPU cool. Between 40° and 45° degrees idle, between 45° and 50° while under stress.Also contrary to some other comments here I do not experience any loudness from the fan. When putting my ear close enough to where it can almost be chopped off by the fan I do hear a slight rattle.So not too impressed with the quality, but positively surprised by how well it functions for said quality.

This is the second time I've had to replace one of these and I was overjoyed that I could buy it on here and have it quickly instead of giving my info to some random sketchy website and hope it showed up in a month. I was looking for the one with the copper core but these are interchangeable. I know I didn't need to buy the whole thing again but it's good to have a backup

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was exactly the fan I needed to get my PC running again. Promptly delivered.

reviews.reviewTitle: Definition of perfect for a practice build.
reviews.reviewText: It works well and connects well, I have been looking for a cooler and the last 2 broke on their way to my place.
Todo perfecto encaja a la perfección con mi procesador, funcionando al 100% las 24h al día que lo tengo encendido.
Excelente producto. Original y muy buena calidad. Llegó en tiempo y forma 100% recomendable. Hasta ahora lo sigo probando y está trabajando sin problema. Gracias por ser tan profesionales.
